ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: I am a full stack developer passionate about creating modern and efficient web applications.
ABOUT.BIO: Data Analytics Engineer with over two years of experience in the retail sector. I have contributed to the design and development of a self-service data platform, dashboards, and data pipelines using Looker, Tableau, DBT, and BigQuery. My approach is based on active listening and a deep understanding of business needs, allowing me to design effective and relevant data solutions.

ACHIEVEMENTS: Development and deployment of Auchan France's first Looker platform with over 2000 users (BigQuery, Looker, and Dbt)
Modeling, design, and maintenance of the semantic layer (Dbt, BigQuery, LookML, and Airflow)
Implementation of data transformation pipelines (Dbt, SQL, and BigQuery)
Creation and maintenance of dashboards (Tableau, Looker)

Animation of the Tableau community and an internal Auchan Looker community through training, dashboard optimization, and technology watch.
